name: Children of Midnight Ongoing Beta
description:
This is a constantly changing beta for the final draft of Children of Midnight. This is separate from the *stable playtest* release which launched on 05/15. The final release is expected on or around 07/15 (date very subject to change). All files for this project will be hosted on google drive and subject to regular updates over the next 2 months.

*This is hardcore mode for cutting-edge playtesting; there may errors in the text from time to time, stubbed out sections that are currently in progress, half-complete layout changes and a lot of incomplete artwork. But, if you want the most up-to-date copy at any given time to play with the latest alterations to the Children of Midnight game this is the project to follow*

My in-house playtest group will be using this ruleset. Any online games you might find elsewhere are probably using the stable release @ https://balsamicmoongames.itch.io/children-of-midnight.
